text:
One person was arrested on Saturday in connection with the murder of a Samajwadi Party leader’s nephew, whose body was found in a sewer here earlier in the morning, police said.

Manoj, the 32-year-old nephew of SP’s Meerut district general secretary Anil Chaudhary was allegedly called out of his home by two of his friends, Kapil and Manoj on Friday evening after which he did not return home.

Recovered from sewer

His body was found by family members in a sewer in Shatabdi Nagar area, Superintendent of Police Om Prakash said.

“Manoj’s stomach was found slit and his face had scars inflicted with a heavy object. The body has been sent for post-mortem and the police are investigating the case”, he said.

Kapil has been arrested and efforts are under way to apprehend Manoj after the deceased’s family filed a against the two, Mr. Prakash said.

A dispute over money was said to be the reason behind the murder, he said. — PTI
title: SP leader’s nephew murdered, one held
